name: Welcome to the Graveyard
description:
The cemetery's latest addition is stuck in limbo - lend a helping hand from beyond the grave, move bones to their final resting place, and make the most of the afterlife!

Controls: 
WASD - Move Ghost
Mouse - Move Camera
Space - Jump/Double Jump
E - Pick up/Drop Item
ESC - Exit

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47.  Patched from the original with a start screen UI & fixing some bugs.

Created by Seth Paxton & Ben Ash, Copyright 2020
